content.detailedDescription: It was at approximately 2 am eastern time on august 15, 2008 as i was driving home from work. i had just left the town of perrysburg heading east on rte. 795 when i happened to glance up at the sky, as it was a full moon out and a storm had just passed. i was checking to see if there were any more dark clouds when all of a sudden, off in the direction of the northeast, i saw what i originally thought was a cluster of three stars, placed close together in a straight line. this had piqued my curiosity because i had never seen anything like that before. i continued to drive, periodically glancing up at the sky and noticing that the object did not move. it remained in my field of vision for about 6 miles until i turned off the highway onto an exit ramp. i continued to look at the object through the rearview mirror as i was now heading south down a country road. as i pulled into the subdivision that i lived in, i happened to look back to the northeast- but instead of the three star-like objects, there appeared a large object, shaped almost like a blimp, with five or six white lights making the outline of the object and three red lights in the center of the white ones. i followed the object as it moved east to west at what i would guess to say would be about 50 miles per hour had it been traveling on the ground. i lost sight of the object as it passed over the nearby train yard on the other side of the road, as my view of the sky to the west is obscured by the trains and a grove of trees nearby.
content.summary: Strange red and white shaped object in northwest ohio

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the meteor shower on the 13th when i saw a star appear that was a bit brighter than the others moving down the sky. i at first thought it was a satellite, then it took a hard 45 degree right turn and then a approx. 80 degree hard turn back left and then faded out.

my jaw instantly dropped wide open, since this was my first sighting after many nights of star gazing. never thought i would see this in my area
content.summary: Star like, eratic movements

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on i-70 west through indianapolis watching planes taking off when i noticed a shiny circle object at a much higher altitude than the planes that were taking off when all of a sudden the object just disappeared. the object to me didn't seem very large and made no movement in any direction. i watched the object for less than 30 seconds when it just disappeared. i found this strange because it was so shiny in clear sky's it was very noticeable so i would see the object if it moved but i didn't, it was just gone.
content.summary: I noticed a shiny circle/oval shaped object  when all of a sudden the object just disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Read narrative on story below.
content.summary: Objecy or objects looked like they are on fire-yhis thing must be huge

content.detailedDescription: My family was having a christmas party and we were outside at the fire pit approx. 10 pm. i was taking pics of everyone around the fire and turned around to take a picture of the full moon, which was in the eastern sky, i thought it might look cool between the trees . i noticed something when i was scrolling through my pics on the camera  but couldn't find my transfer cable for the computer . the camera is an olympus d-560 with a 10x optical zoom which was at maximum at the time i took the two pictures,well i found my cable yesterday and yransfered it to my hp desktop and zoomed in,  well, take a look for yourselves. it' awesome!
content.summary: I was taking a pc. of the moon and didn't even see it at the time

content.detailedDescription:
It was a round transparent ball with rainbow stripes and a star in the center. it had thin lines on the surface that looked like cheeze clough. the outline of the object was clear and distenct, not blured like the photos. the ring was snug against the ball and looked like solid bronze. the ring was very flat and smooth. there were very large dark areas on the ssurface of the ball that changed size as it moved. 

i was a 5 year old boy sitting in my back yard playing with my toy cars and facing north. the groung started to sparcle and make a fant beeping sound. then i felt something very hot on my back. it felt like a hot 3 inch pipe was right behind me, i turned to see what it was and i saw the object in the sky. it did not seem to be moving so i went back to playing with my cars. i looked again a little later and it was higher in the sky. it slowly went under then over the sun and came back down near where it came up. it passed down behind a telephone pole about 10 feet from me and it extended beyound bouth sides of the pole at once. 

i did not think much of the object because it was moving so slowly.

ps. los angeles is off catilena island.
content.summary: Same as almirante saldanha sighting

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of august 11th, 2008  myself and a neighbor were checking out some really neat looking shooting stars, it was that we witnessed two things that looked much like an ordinary star moving along pretty fast, at first i thought they were just perhaps satellites until the one suddenly stopped for a few seconds then started moving in a slightly different direction then it slowed up a bit for maybe two seconds before heading south and disappearing.     
this was very exciting to watch, about a minute later a second light appeared and was lower in altitude or so it seemed, it came from the south and was heading north was also clipping along pretty fast, just before it was out of sight it made a quick turn to the left.  both of these lights had no strobes or colored aircraft marker lamps.  well needless to say at this point we were very excited indeed.
so now we are really looking.... then plain as day a perfectly round flat looking object flew directly overhead quickly, followed by two more of the same looking objects. they were low enough to clearly see that they were not birds or even an owl. they appeared to be a light tan color with no lights and made no sound, the strangest thing of all was the in which they were moving, its a little hard to explain but it almost seemed animated, and yet had a obvious destination in mind.
my neighbor and myself are still laughing about how we just about jumped into each others lap.  all i could think to myself was wow, the sky sure is busy tonight!
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three light tan colored  objects moveing fast and low from west to east.

content.detailedDescription: It was a very clear morning, no clouds in the sky. i was getting ready to go to work. i was about to get into my car and happened to look up in the sky toward the southeast. i observed an object about 30-35 degrees above the horizon. the object was motionless and no sound was heard. the object resembled a 55 gallon drum just hanging there.It was about the size of a pencil eraser held at arms length. what struck me about the object, besides it was not moving and there was no noise was the clarity and vividness of color. while the upper portion was dark the lower was a tannish color, but the color was extremely vivid. i watched the object for about 2 to 3 minutes, it did not move. i rushed into my house to alert my wife and get a camera. when i returned outside the object was gone. the image still is vivid in my mind. i am submitting to see if any one else has seen something similar. what reminded me to report this, i was reviewing your files and one incident that occured in new york on 5/22/2007, felt like being watched, the one photo reminded me of what i saw, similar shape. a floating 55 gal drum.
content.summary: Motionless "barrel shaped object" hovering, no sound

content.detailedDescription: My backyard looks out over a corn field, but a few weeks ago we had some strong winds and some of the corn was knocked down. but a few here and there still stand. i saw what i thought was a plane. north about 12 miles above a hill line that is on towerline rd. going to pekin after the river. i had my camera with me and my binoculars. through my binoculars i could see a white sphere with green and blue lights, strobing. coming closer i thought ok a plane but i'll watch it anyway which would be good so i can pick out planes over ufo's. i had come off the back steps and into the yard and i could still see it right above the corn and i was dodging random stalks to keep it in view and i lost it. i took my binoculars down and there it was a whole lot closer to my back yard and higher. it had covered seven miles in a split second. no sound i made sure of that. i looked at it and grabbed my camera , as i brought my camera up it disappeared. gone. clouds to the south , clear to the north. now this is not the first time this has happened this summer. but each one seems to know i'm there and sort of performs for me.
content.summary: Bright strobing thought it was a plane but covered about 7 miles and ascended in the blink of an eye

content.detailedDescription:
I was a radioman on the coral sea. i was being trained for air traffic control, next logical step for a radioman. it was a sunday afternoon, which is a good time to train someone because it's slow. 
at about 2 in the afternoon i saw something on the radar screen about a hundred miles off the coast heading in our direction. i didn't think anything of it. it happens several times a week. usually it's some civilian who doesn't know where he is. i get on the radio. "unidentified aircraft, you are entering a restricted airspace. please identify and correct course." i didn't get a response, which is strange because people usually respond right away when the military calls them. it started making some strange moves that i'd never seen an aircraft make before. it looked like when bugs bunny gets hold of the controls of the spaceship. the most interesting move was a sudden stop with a 140 degree turn.
my first thought was something was wrong with the equipment: temperature inversion, electrical storm, glitch. anything can happen to these things. i go through all the checks and everything checks out clear. i try hailing it again and it still doesn't respond. still trying to be reasonable i thought maybe we had a hot dog pilot doing some things i didn't know about. i'm just a boy from montana. 
i call over the chief warrant officer. "sir, do we have smothing that does this?"
he looked at the screen and said, "that's a glitch sailor. forget about it. that tape will be turned over for further study."
i said, "if it's just a glitch then why are you studying it?"
he just glared at me and said, "did you ask me a question sailor?"
"uh, how do i list this?"
"bogie. period."
"yes sir."
i had a four hour debriefing on something that officially doesn't exist.
"an unidentified object is exactly that, unidentified. you got that?"
"yes sir. can i go now?"
"no. sit."
"yes sir."
the funny thing is when they said, "you didn't see it but what did it do?"
which story did they want me to follow?
i had read stories about men in black and threats. i asked them if i could tell anyone about it. their response was even a little bit scarier than a threat. they said i could tell anyone i want. my story is easy because there is nothing to deny.
i asked them what they meant by that. 
the closest they came to a threat was they said, "it shouldn't get back to us but if it does, here is our side of the story. it was your first day being trained on some equipment you were unfamiliar with. you something on the screen you didn't recognize. you made a note of it, we looked into it, we had a meeting, you were reassigned to your primary task."
they don't deny anything. they don't even disagree with anything i say.
that's my story.
content.summary: Radar image, acting strangely

content.shape: Circle,  Disc,  Egg,  Fireball,  Flash,  Oval,  Sphere

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a condo on the 16th floor, facing the eastern sky. i love to occasionally go out on my balcony on a starry night and just sit and look at the stars. this august night i saw two meteors and was just getting ready to go back inside when i saw a round bright white light appear in the sky. i immediately said wow because i new i had just seen something important. this is the way i explained it to my daughter the next day. i told her it was as if someone had turned on a flashlight in the night sky. the stars would all be the size of pennies and this light i saw was the size of a 50 cent piece next to the stars. it only lasted for about 3 seconds and was gone. i knew it wasn't a plane or helicopter, it was very high up in the sky. the flashlight is the best way to describe it, i kept watching that area for awhile afterwards and saw no moving object. the theory of what i had seen at that moment was that it came out of some portal or dimension and i just happened to get a glimpse of it.

thank you, i hope this was helpful.
content.summary: Bright round white light flashed only once among the stars.

content.summary: Goingacrossthesky

content.detailedDescription:
while watching discovery channel's presentation concerning foreign objects embedded in subcutaneous areas of the bodies of people claiming alien abduction i noticed something that caused me question.  in particular, i'm referring to the sample "device" taken from the ankle of a woman in california.  initially perplexed by the three layer makeup of this iron laden object the analysis was finally determined to be a rather small piece of knife steel.  i'm sure a knifemaker would love to see a bit of his work testify so well as the characteristics shown by that electron microscope image.  however, i doubt that the change from soft steel to hard steel would be that pronounced, but i don't portend any metalurgical degree.  furthermore, i personally don't buy into the idea of alien implants regarless of how much fun it is to watch that stuff.  however, i do know a semi-conductor when i see one.  the structure of lsic (large scale integrated circuit) or single transistor device appears exactly as in that em image in as much as both are "grown" from the atomic level.
   i would suggest that the good "foot doctor" who has been collecting these artifacts from "abductees" not lose hope; he may yet be on to something!
content.summary: None

content.detailedDescription:
I haven't been able to sleep for the previos week or so. i have been waking up at 2:00 a.M. and this night i decided to go out and watch the  meteor showers. i was staring at the sky and i saw this thing that didn't look like a star or anything i have seen in the sky. i was sitting on my front porch and it was off to the east right out in the open.
i see planes go by all the time and this was nothing i've seen before. i kept looking at it and it was pulsing with red and green lights. it moved up and down and sideways but stayed in the same general area. i watched it for a couple hours and it just disapeared in the sky like a flash. i felt almost felt like it knew i was watching it. it was kind of like a tingling feeling.
i went out again the next night (aug. 11th) it was there again doing the same thing. i went out again (aug. 12th) and it wasn't there.
i couldn't stop thinking about what it could be so i kept going back out each night looking for it again. 
when i first saw it i was curious as to what it was. when it started moving around and pulsing with lights i became frightened. when it took off and disapeared it kind of felt like i was in a dream.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It was not a star or a comet. it was large and pulsing with green and red lights.

content.detailedDescription:
This happen on august 11th, 2008 around 9:30 pm central time in saint louis. i'm a usual stargazer as i love to look at the sky and admire its beauty in our front yard. i have had ufo experiences previously and i also go outside to see if i can see any activity up in the sky. (please read below for more!). i saw this star-like ufo traveling down south. it was extremely high up. it seemed hundreds of feet above the atmosphere. it has no blinking lights as it looked like a planet. it was traveling straight and slow and then it slowly disappeared which appeared the object had cloaked. when i saw it i was excited and had my eyes on it for most of the time and i thought is that a plane and then with further observing i knew it wasn't any earth vehicle or satellite. 

i have had many experiences like this in the past since 2001. i have seen several like this one this year. i seen a ginormous ufo a few weeks prior which appeared to be as big as jupiter traveling north which behaved like the one i saw on the 11th. i have seen these behave different in many ways. i have seen them travel back and forth, and cloak and uncloak like a peek-a-boo or a now you see me, now you don't game. i have recently seen one that was going down east which the entire object was flashing but it was a very slow flashing characteristic. now, i have seen two that were not like these a couple years ago. these were on two separate days. they both were extremely high but had a very unusual red flashing characteristic and the one went into hyperspace or warp speed like you see in the star wars and star trek films. that was incredible to witness! i believe these red ones are man made but has alien technology. i have been wondering so long what these are and who/what might be piloting them. it is a wonderful but creepy feeling that i get when i see these objects because i wonder are they the grays, the insectoids or something that we know absolutely nothing about or all of these different species. by seeing these ufos i know that we are not alone! if anyone has any answers and/or has had these experiences please contact me with your information!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star or planet like ufo moving south plus more!

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside around 8:00 pm playing frisbee with my dog. i happened to look up and was amazed to see an object in the sky with a short comet like tail. i was surprised as it seemed unusual. so i ran inside to get my monocular. i came back and observed it with the monocular. it seemed to be disc shaped, but was still too far away to make it out clearly. but since it looked more disc shaped than jet shaped, i ran back in and got my camera.

it is a sony cybershot 7.2 megapixal. i keep it set on fine to get the highest resolution i can. i took about five still shots of which two show it pretty clearly. the object definitely appears disc shaped when you zoom in on the image. i then switched to video mode and filmed it for several minutes. 

the sun was starting to set and my settings must not have been so good. i am not able to see the object on the video because the sky appears too bright. i don���t know how to adjust the brightness on a video unless you go in frame by frame. i know i can try to go in and freeze a frame and adjust it, but have not tried that yet. 

the object was traveling from the ne to the sw so it was traveling somewhat in the direction of the setting sun. as i was filming it a helicopter flew by, much closer in range. i don���t know if they noticed this other object in the sky. i also heard the helicopter very well and yet i heard no sound from the object, although it seemed to be flying around the same height that most jets seem to fly. i can always here them in my location

the object and its short comet like tail were very bright; almost hot white, with a tinge of yellow. i watched and filmed it until it disappeared behind the tree line in the west.
content.summary: Disc with comet tail

content.detailedDescription:

hello, i walked on the banks of the seine river in the late afternoon with my camera.

i stop and take a photo of austerlitz bridge near the gare de lyon, i look at the photo that i took, and i noticed an object on the screen.

i note his eyes to heaven and sees a kind of device a large, i can not gauge the distance.

the time frame for that i take another photo, the object had disappeared.

this was neither an airplane or a helicopter or a bird or a balloon.

i had time to see that the lower part of the apparatus tournais on itself, regardless of the upper part, which was fixed.

i have never seen such a thing, i do not believe in ufos.

a friend who i showed the photo has helped me do research on the internet and i recognized the same purpose that i had seen on an english site, i believe, observed in the usa.

they called it "a drone," a kind of surveillance aircraft, but i've never seen a paris or elsewhere.

i can swear that it was amazing, and most incredible is that nobody else has seen the object at the same time as me.

the same friend told me not to disseminate the original photo, i have not fully understood, but i would join the photo in small, for the moment ...

i'm still excited about what i saw, and i can tell you that i lift his eyes to heaven every day since monday.

"you have to understand the symbolism, the understanding of; prepare yourself for the coming of the father in heaven. to be inseminated by this father in heaven in the bridal chamber, to totally be regenerated, to be purified, to be cleansed. every cell in your body will be taken beck to the state it is supposed to be, when you were a teenager or a child. it perfects the dna, and closes the light within the body until you literally reach a point where the light body exceeds the physical body. you literally light up a room when you walk in. the gifts that go with this are perfect telepathy, you can know good and evil when it is in the room with you, you can project your thoughts into someone else's mind, you can levitate, you can walk on water, because it is flowing so much light in you, you literally don't attract to gravity.

"when you understand that your body can now exclude all magnetic and other fields, including gravity, you are no longer of this space-time, you become a fifth dimensional being. you literally can think where you'd like to be and you can go there and disappear from here. the ancient texts specify the appearance of other attributes such as healing with the laying on of hands, they claim you can resurrect the dead within two or three days after they die. instead of using electrical paddles you embrace their people and bring energy and life back into them. most groups don't receive this very well. it works.

"christ said to his disciples, "don't touch me, i don't have on my earthly garments." they said, when will we see you again? christ replied, "when you have prepared the proper food and when you have on your proper garments." what is the proper food? it is the food of the angels, the food of the gods, the manna, the ���what is it'? the proper garment is your garment of glory, your rainbow garment, your meissner field is what science calls it, and literally it's about 1000 times what you have now.

"the amazing thing about superconductors they don't have to touch for current to flow. electricity has to touch for current to flow but superconductors can sit at a distance from each other, and as long as they are resonant to each other they are as one. they function as one. when you have your perfect superconducting body you are no longer of this space-time. you are a light-being, your mind is one with other people's minds. you literally know their thoughts and they know your thoughts. you're one mind and one heart and this is science. 

"the bible says that the man who will plant the golden tree of life, which in hebrew is the orme tree, the name of my patent, and i had no idea of this when i filed my patent. my cousin joined the mormon church and they told her to do our genealogy. my thrice great grandmother is hanna deguies, the daughter of christopher deguies, brother of claude deguies, who if you read the book, holy blood holy grail, you know who the deguies' are. nostrodamus worked with the deguies family and nostrodamus prophesied that by 1999, the occult gold will be known by science. the old enemy of religion and philosophy is science. but in fact, science will serve up the confirmation and science will be the one to bring this to the world.

in revelations it says: blessed shall be the man who will overcome, for he shall be given the hidden manna, the white stone of purest kind upon which will be written a new name, you will not be the same person. it's encoded in your dna waiting to be activated. 

solar flares, which produce cosmic ray bursts, increase ionic flow through the body. these may actually be responsible for unlocking ancient symbols encoded in our dna. nature works in mysterious ways.

the definition of niberu is the ferry or portal through which the anunnaki actually came through. project stardust may reveal insights into life. this is the monatomic superconductor used to power cell division in all living things; both plants and animals.

my book, philosopher's stone contains seven recipes which show how to extract m-state in your kitchen from various source materials such as sea salt, limestone and granite powder. it can enable you to live hundreds of years and multiply your intelligence several times.

as the portal opens in the center of our galaxy we may begin experience a spiritual awakening some time in the year 2006 as the stuff comes down from heaven again. how are we going to translate this knew knowledge for the betterment of humanity? will it be locked up for the rich or will it be available to all?

content.summary: It looked like they were practicing manovers. they shot lights at each other and stopped short and made right ancle turns for several hours.

content.detailedDescription:
Object looked like a satelight but moved at a speed that i have never seen before.  the object finally became to far for me to see.  it was orange in color and the size of star. 

i was laying on the diving board staring at the clouds, while having a conversation with my fiance and then she walked off. at this time it was darker and then i saw it.  i called her and her mom to witness the object too.  the object moved straight at a high valocity of speed.  with the speed it was traveling we all trhgought it was a ufo, it very quickly  ran out of our sight.
content.summary: Object moving at extream speeds across sky

content.detailedDescription: I was attending the annual ufo olympics conference at the ufo watchtower sponsored by mufon this last weekend near hooper, co.  camping in my parked car facing east towards the sand dunes, i was awake between about 4:30 am and 5:00 am on 3 separate nights in succession.  studying the stars and constellations rising in the early morning hours just before dawn i happened to see out of the corner of my eye (facing south) through the open window of my car - a bright orange star-like object i initially took to be the planet mars, only somewhat brighter.  after a few minutes a curious thing happened - this stationary object i thought was planet mars started to gradually fade out and disappear!  this took about 20 seconds to go from full brightness to a full disappearence.  that in itself was not too unusual, as it could have been some object at a high altitude that was reflecting early morning sunlight (before sunrise).  i dismissed that sighting as an unexplained anomaly but not too remarkable.  but what grabbed my attention was the fact that the same sighting occured the very next night at about the same time (bright mars-like object) that disappeared gradually. (a repeat of the night before).  watching for it again on the third night, this time (again in a clear sky) it did not appear at all- so i was left wondering and have concluded it was a sighting of an unexplained event.  not very dramatic as ufo's go in general, but still very curious because the two successive sightings did not fit any known object i could relate it to.  it may have been reflected sunlight off of a metallic skin craft at very high altitude that had the ability to disappear (in place) without moving, since any craft moving out of the sun's rays would be easily detected.  it was definitely not covered by clouds, an earth satellite, an irridium flare, a meteor, a helicopter or any known craft that i can think of.  if anyone knows more about what this could have been, please respond.  thank you
content.summary: Appeared like planet mars but faded out of sight in a clear sky - 2 separate nights in succession.

content.detailedDescription:
This hazy august evening a friend of mine and i were walking the dog and my friend looked up at the moon and said,"what is that object by the moon?" i looked up to the moon in the eastern dusk sky and we both identified a black triangular object traveling northeast, about an inch below, at arm's lenght, beneath the moon.  there was another unidentifiable black object about 45 degrees in front and above the triangle, traveling in the same northeast direction.  the triangular object was rotating clockwise while travelling forward.  the animation of the july 28th sighting in jacksonville, fl, which is on skyscan, is exactly what the larger, triangular object looked like.

the objects were moving slowly and not at any type of speed for ascending or descending aircraft normally found in the area. there were no sounds.  there were no planes in the sky leaving ft lauderdale int'l airport, nor could it have been a plane in the distance going to/from miami international, because these objects were within naked eyesight and before the haze diminished visibility.

wondering if anyone else saw and if mufon or skyscan wants to contact, please feel free to do so.  this is our second ft lauderdale sighting of different objects in the sky sine novemeber 2007.
content.summary: Black rotating triangle with black object leading

content.detailedDescription:
while watching tv on a very clear, very normal night in rural missouri a light appeared in my feild of vision. my front door was open so i could clearly see 1 brilliant round amber light hovering silently no more than 20 feet from my house. my entire yard was lit up by the glow from the object. i mean this thing was brilliant! i was stunned  but i wanted to know what it was. by the time i slipped my sandals on and looked again, it had moved (silently!) way up in the sky. now all i could see was 9 more identical lights moving in a triangal formation. the most shocking thing was the distance it moved (3-5 miles) in such little time (3 seconds) with no sound what so ever!
   back to the triangle formation. the object was made of 10 of these round amber lights, 5 down each side. the unknown object cicled in complete silence for at least 15 minutes before i totally lost site of it. 
   when i saw pictures of the phoenix lights some time later, i remember thinking "that's what i saw!!". was it the same object(s)? nobody will ever know. all i know is this really happened and i will never forget it for as long as i live.
content.summary: 1 round amber light ,4 to 5 feet in diameter, hovering in my back yard.

content.detailedDescription:
Coming from starsyne dragon going to starsyne ram. seen trough the roofwindow of my bathroom. flying in a very, very slight downward angled line and moving a tiny but away from each other.
we are close to airport schiphol/amsterdam.
i know the way how airplanes look in all sorts, scapes and formes, by night and by day and at any flybyhight.
normaly i feel the planes before, during and after they pass our house via the ground ( i am very highly sensitive ). i could not feel this objects in any way. there was no sound.
i was practising the starsynes with my adjustible starchart, with the light in the bathroom out, and just an lichttorch at hand, wich was turned of at the moment of flyby.
if there had been any form of light at the moment of flyby, i would absolutely not have seen them.
they were dark from form but very sharp visible against the sky, with softglowing darkred bellies (only in the middle).
it were two formations made of three triangles - ore - two triangles with transparant body and visible traingles on the points.
the points of the triangles were in the flightdirection (say ruffly to the south).
it was a realy clear night (that was wy i could practice my starsynes), with the background (the black of the nightsky) very darkblue glowing.
the flyby time was close to one second.
the flyhight of the objects i could not tell, because i don't know how big they were.
when i would have drawn the formations on the window like i saw them, and would mesure them, i would think about 8 centimeters from farest point to farest point.
all the triangleforms were all sides the same lenght.
whem i saw them, i felt a great joy inside. they were beautiful, and very clear.
i have seen ufo's earlyer in my live (a few months before the ufo sightings over belgium, were the airforce of belgium reacted on), and i was pleasantly surprised, that i saw ufo's again.
those were big lightsin triangle formation. the ufo's i saw now, in 2007, could have been the same, but with the lights very low glowing.

the day after i contacted schiphol, but they don't do anything with it.
maybe i had the wrong person on the telephone.
i know the date very well, because it was the night after my fathers birthday (who died that year) and the birthday of my "daughter in law" (13th and 14th of november), and the time, because i had a clock near me, for ajusting the starsyne-chart to the right time.
content.summary: 2 times 3 triangles in triangulare formation ore two trianglare shapes with on the point triangles and in the middle transparant. soft red glowing "bellies".

content.detailedDescription: My friends buddy, bullard, buddy's mom, and i were leaving their apartment complex to go to the store to get cigarettes. as we started driving...Arlene (buddy's mom) noticed it first, but bullard and i pointed it out, seeing as how we didn't know what it was we were looking at. it was dark, so we couldn't see the "object," but we saw the lights on it illuminate in a circular motion. some of them faded, but lit back up. after all the lights on the "object" were fully illuminated, it flew off the right at a very fast speed, and the lights were just a blur as it vanished. several seconds later, as buddy, bullard, and i were sticking our heads out of the window, the "object" reappeared, but this time, in a different spot. i couldn't see it clearly, but i could still see at least half of the lights. this time, it didn't stay lit too long...And once again, it vanished. after the sighting, bullard and i noticed several (about 5 or 6) planes flying in the direction of the "object." as we got back to the apartment complex, there were several neighbors sitting on the steps; they asked us if we have seen "anything" in the sky. we simply replied with a yes, and they were happy, telling us that, "they were glad they weren't crazy." we live near a air force base, and are used to seeing many different kind of planes and jets during the day and night, and this is like nothing we have ever seen before. when i told my mom about it the next day about the "sighting," she told me that during the same time period, she noticed and heard several jets and planes taking off from the base heading towards adel. all of us were astonished at what we saw...And during it, we couldn't believe what we saw...But knew that it was real. after seeing it...We all stayed outside and watched the sky; hoping to see it again. we have notified the local paper.
content.summary: Circle illuminated object

content.detailedDescription:
I reported a event on 2/12/2007  @ 8:21 p.M. in the southern calif. desert at the salton sea. i do not know how to contact you after the fact ? i was asked to fill out a questionair some time later but it was deleted . i am interested in following up on this and would like to stay in contact with your organization . please contact me at the info given above . thank you , ed winters   e-mail = geebeeair@msn.Com
 (760) 395 5902 = home 
 (760) 608 1746 = cell
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red object in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling north on highway 1 @ 3 miles south of solon, ia at approximately 9:00 pm and i saw three red lights in the sky.  i noticed the lights because i was watching dark clouds to the north and the lights weren't blinking.  i thought it very odd that three planes would be so close together.  as i drove i noted that i was getting closer to the lights and they weren't moving. the lights seemed to be much lower in the sky as i got closer.  as i drove under the lights they were approximately the size of a dinner plate in the sky and appeared to be a golden/orange color.  there was a white van parked on the side of the road  and the driver was out looking at the lights, but i did not stop.

i thought it was extremely strange that i drove closer and then under the lights and they didn't seem to be moving at all, other than being much lower in the sky than i expected.  

i did not notice any light beams coming from the ground or any vehicles. i lost sight of the lights when i rounded a curve. the lights were gone when i drove south on the same route approximately 30 minutes later with my husband. we did not see any lights in any direction on our way south to iowa city.
content.summary: Three red lights in sky turned golden/orange when i drove under them

content.detailedDescription: I was using a lens on my canon 5d that is not made for a full frame sensor thus the vignetting around the edge of the frame. i was taking pictures of a rainbow and in a series of shot from the same angle this shot was a middle one and shows a bizarre object. i thought maybe a it was sensor dust that is not the case because none of the other in the series shows this defect. this looks like a stealth aircraft closeup but i am not sure what it is. look to the top left corner of the image.
content.summary: Stealth aircraft/skyfish?

content.detailedDescription: Well, it began on monday night, the 11th of august.  i didn't see this insidence, but my 9 yr old daughter was on the couch because she said she was too scared to sleep in her room.  she said before she fell asleep, ( around 10 ish) she thought she saw a ufo in a field near our house....Now i disregarded her because i hadn't heard anything on the news, or see anything myself, besides, she was only 9.  sometimes nine yr olds say funny things to get out of sleeping by their self in their own bed.  then came tuesday--it was about 10:30 approx.  i was smoking my bedtime cigarette out on the porch of my apartment.  i watched the stars for a few minutes and then focused my eyes on a "plane"...Their were particulary alot of planes in the nighttime sky.  this one was kind of blinking like a police car, although i'm not sure i saw blue...I saw red and white for sure....The plane just flew by, nice and serene like, then wham!  it flew almost like ( dare i say it) hyperspeed.  no joke! then it was gone...I watched the other "planes", in awe, but no other plane showed such character...That's my story, i wish i had a way of confirming it because my daughter and i are pretty freaked.  thanks!
content.summary: Slowly flew like a plane, then rocketed off into the sky
